pages.text: To get started making jam, you will need the following equipment and ingredients: $(br) $(li) A bucket of water  $(li) A piece of sugar $(li) Assorted pieces of any food you want - your ingredients $(li)  A jam pot  $(li)  An empty jam jar $(br) The crafting recipes for the jam jar and pot can be seen on the following pages.

The jam pot is your main tool within the jam making world. $(br2) It is used to mix your jam to create all manor of flavours and...atrocities if you wish. $(br2) It's the first port of call for any new jam maker.
The jam jar is a reusable container from which to eat to your heart's content. $(br2) It is used to store and eat your jam.
